text:
Message 2116 of 4024
Not sure you have time, but I’ve tried to stay on top of SAAS today. AD is up to date, knows about Tues &
Wed, has his class schedule, knows what to bring and what to expect in study hall.
I also an acknowledged the Study Skills enrollment and the expected associated cost. Next step is another email from Catherine to set up a
Family Partnership Meeting.
Let me know if you have questions or concerns. I’m not trying to step on toes but I can help keep this plate spinning while you focus elsewhere.
best...
Sent:03/11/2024 at 04:20 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/11/2024 at 04:20 PM)
Subject:Re: SAAS
Message 2117 of 4024
We have a fundamental difference of opinion on how to proceed.
This is not AnnaLisa speaking.
I have now fully dug into the implications and potential outcomes for different paths, and am realizing what has transpired and the control and
coercion you have tried to assert on me through this process, for a certain path. The genuine fear I operate on to soothe things or not get you upset or
angry. The need for the RO as recent as January, is a demonstration of that dynamic, and yet you act as if that was not serious or your actions did not
really warrant one based on your continued assertions that your story is correct.
Your reference to $$$ spent is another scare tactic to acquiesce to your desire to structure everything to maximize your outcome, which does not
provide the real protection to me and boys or provide the true and acknowledge what transpired in the marriage and family dynamic. If the truth is
not revealed, I have lost that protection.
Sent:03/11/2024 at 04:20 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/11/2024 at 04:20 PM)
Subject:Re: $$$ Today $$$
Message 2118 of 4024
Id like to understand what you are saying. I don’t get what you mean. I am not trying to scare you in the least. I am trying to work with you.
The RO that I offered and the apologies I made are real and authentic. Please stop saying the opposite of what I am confirming in writing again here.
May we please talk about this? I have assured you that I won’t argue. I just want to understand your perspective so we can partner safely for the kids.
May you please explain. I’m all ears. Honestly.
Sent:03/11/2024 at 04:26 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/11/2024 at 06:48 PM)
Subject:Re: $$$ Today $$$
